description: The story of the Awareness House concept, as begun in Fort Bragg, California, which provides a meaningful alternative to drugs. "Turn on to people, not drugs". Ex-addicts, who are experienced drug specialists, provide counselling and realistic drug abuse information. The teenagers involved talk freely about their reasons for giving up narcotics.
